data.content: Implemented default workflow profile setting. Changes: (1) Added defaults.profileId to settings schema in schemas.ts, (2) Added defaults merge in settings.ts updateSettings, (3) Created SettingsDefaultsSection component with workflow profile dropdown, (4) Wired into SettingsSheet between Auto-Verification and Default Agent Command, (5) CreateBeatDialog now fetches settings and uses defaults.profileId as the pre-selected profile for Shift+N. Falls back to autopilot if unset or profile not found. All tests pass, types clean.
